abstract: Nomura Holdings has recruited Citigroup‘s former co-head of Asia-Pacific investment banking, Dan McNamara, to be Nomura’s co-head of corporate finance for Asia.
snippet: Nomura Holdings has recruited Citigroup‘s former co-head of Asia-Pacific investment banking, Dan McNamara, to be Nomura’s co-head of corporate finance for Asia.
lead_paragraph: Nomura Holdings has recruited Citigroup‘s former co-head of Asia-Pacific investment banking, Dan McNamara, to be Nomura’s co-head of corporate finance for Asia.

headline.main: Citi Asia Banker Lands at Nomura
